Package com.netflix.genie.client.interceptors

Class ResponseMappingInterceptor

java.lang.Object
com.netflix.genie.client.interceptors.ResponseMappingInterceptor
All Implemented Interfaces:
okhttp3.Interceptor
public class ResponseMappingInterceptor extends Object implements okhttp3.Interceptor
Class that evaluates the retrofit response code and maps it to an appropriate Genie Exception.
Since:
3.0.0
